00059 #include "cfs_bf.h"
00060 #include "cfs_bfl.h"
00061 
00062 /* Blowfish as implemented from 'Blowfish: Springer-Verlag paper'
00063  * (From LECTURE NOTES IN COIMPUTER SCIENCE 809, FAST SOFTWARE ENCRYPTION,
00064  * CAMBRIDGE SECURITY WORKSHOP, CAMBRIDGE, U.K., DECEMBER 9-11, 1993)
00065  */
00066 
00067 #if (BF_ROUNDS != 16) && (BF_ROUNDS != 20)
00068 If you set BF_ROUNDS to some value other than 16 or 20, you will have
00069 to modify the code.
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 void BF_encrypt(data,key,encrypt)
00073 BF_LONG *data;
00074 BF_KEY *key;
00075 int encrypt;
00076         {
00077         register BF_LONG l,r,*p,*s;
00078 
00079         p=key->P;
00080         s= &(key->S[0]);
00081         l=data[0];
00082         r=data[1];
00083 
00084         if (encrypt)
00085                 {
00086                 l^=p[0];
00087                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[ 1]);
00088                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[ 2]);
00089                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[ 3]);
00090                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[ 4]);
00091                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[ 5]);
00092                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[ 6]);
00093                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[ 7]);
00094                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[ 8]);
00095                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[ 9]);
00096                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[10]);
00097                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[11]);
00098                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[12]);
00099                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[13]);
00100                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[14]);
00101                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[15]);
00102                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[16]);
00103 #if BF_ROUNDS == 20
00104                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[17]);
00105                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[18]);
00106                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[19]);
00107                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[20]);
00108 #endif
00109                 r^=p[BF_ROUNDS+1];
00110                 }
00111         else
00112                 {
00113                 l^=p[BF_ROUNDS+1];
00114 #if BF_ROUNDS == 20
00115                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[20]);
00116                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[19]);
00117                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[18]);
00118                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[17]);
00119 #endif
00120                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[16]);
00121                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[15]);
00122                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[14]);
00123                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[13]);
00124                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[12]);
00125                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[11]);
00126                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[10]);
00127                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[ 9]);
00128                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[ 8]);
00129                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[ 7]);
00130                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[ 6]);
00131                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[ 5]);
00132                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[ 4]);
00133                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[ 3]);
00134                 BF_ENC(r,l,s,p[ 2]);
00135                 BF_ENC(l,r,s,p[ 1]);
00136                 r^=p[0];
00137                 }
00138         data[1]=l&0xffffffffL;
00139         data[0]=r&0xffffffffL;
00140         }
